name: The Color of Nothing v2
description:
The Color Of Nothing is a 3D, first-person, puzzle game about coloring an empty world with various colors that apply different effects to objects. It follows the story of an eight-year-old boy named Duncan Mayer who one day woke up in this world that resembles a children’s storybook. Duncan must paint the world to solve puzzles, find optional collectible items, and uncover the mysteries of the colorless world.

A gamepad is required to play this prototype demo!
